title: Follow-up workflow: Ensure multi-threading prompts refresh and de-duplicate after CRM/contact changes

sections.text: Fix the follow-up prompt service/UI so multi-threading prompts recompute and re-render when contact records change (CRM sync, merges, role/persona updates) or when an opportunity’s stage changes. Resolve cases where prompts remain stale, disappear, or show duplicates due to cached prompt eligibility results. Add minimal instrumentation around prompt refresh triggers and prompt IDs rendered per account/opportunity to validate behavior in production.
